summary: Added forecast overlay operational workflow documentation to GETTING_STARTED.md with copy/paste runnable commands for weather ingest, forecast generation, and UI viewing.
verification: Would run: Manual verification following documented steps
Would run: 1. make db-up && make migrate
Would run: 4. make dev-api (terminal 1) && make dev-ui (terminal 2)

Would run: 5. curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/forecast/generate -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"min_lon": 19.0, "min_lat": 41.0, "max_lon": 23.0, "max_lat": 43.0, "region_name": "balkans", "horizons_hours": [24, 48, 72]}'
Would run: 6. Open http://localhost:8501, navigate to Balkans region, toggle 'Show forecast overlay'
Would run: Expected: Forecast contours appear on map, browser DevTools shows /tiles/forecast_contours requests with run_id parameter
